title: What is the best way to tell a parent that their child died in school? - Quora

response.answer_text: There no best way to tell any parent that their child died…i think the very least is to tell them right away, in a empathetic way as much as possible you can..life is a gift from the almighty any life.And the feeling of dread loosing A friend or love ones is so painful what more if a father or mother looses a life that they strive to build a life they planed for a life they protect to any kinds of harm.especially in the place you consider there second home.with there second parents the teachers.the responsibility to notify the parents of this things our the head teacher,dean or school admins.and this job very hard for them as well like i said any life is a gift. to learn more self help tip check bestcatcher.com
Unless you are a hospital staff or an EMT you shouldn’t be telling the parents anything except the name of the hospital their child was taken too. The staff there will know what to do.
